title: Notification Unsubscription Details
description: Adobe Campaign notification unsubscriptions allow end-users opt out after opting into topics that can be used for communication such as marketing subscription lists.

unsubscriptionDate.title: Unsubscription Date
unsubscriptionDate.description: Date and time when the end-user has unsubscribed from a notification topic. When the subscription is registered the xdm:unsubscriptionDate must be empty.

remarkID.title: Remark Identifier
remarkID.description: The pre defined remark that the end-user identified when unsubscribing.

remarkText.title: Remark text
remarkText.description: A customer comment/remark that the end-user provided when unsubscribing.
